1504390.name: Imaginarium Demo
1504390.description:
PLEASE NOTE: The game is under development, so there may be bugs and errors! If you find bugs, errors or other undesirable moments in the game, let us know about them so that they can be fixed.



Imaginarium is an indie sandbox game with an open, randomly generated world with elements of survival. Your main task is to unleash your imagination and survive in a world in which there are only a few islands left from the once great Imaginarium world.

Discover new places, fight various monsters, learn the history of the past Imaginarium, create your own history and your new world on the ruins of the old one.
